title: Vector DB
description: A multimodal vector database engine with KD-Tree and KNN search, built using Rust and RocksDB.

title: Game Boy Emulator
description: A fully functional Game Boy emulator replicating original console architecture.

title: RISC-V Simulator
description: Simulator for 64-bit 5-stage pipelined RISC-V processor with operand forwarding and cache simulation.

title: SIC-XE Assembler
description: Assembler for the SIC/XE architecture with Control Section support and two-pass algorithm.

title: Chip-8 Emulator
description: Emulates Chip-8 virtual machine with sound and memory emulation.

title: Torrent Client
description: Peer-to-peer torrent client with custom B-encode decoder and networking.

title: Unix Shell (WIP)
description: A Unix-like shell in Rust with job control, piping, and redirection using low-level syscalls.

title: HecText
description: Terminal-based text editor written in Rust with efficient rendering under 1k LOC.

title: Saviour Supreme
description: LAN-based file sharing app over UDP with encryption and rate limiting.

title: MediaWave
description: Media player with playlists, watch party feature, and real-time chat via ngrok.

title: F1 Game
description: Multiplayer racing game using Unreal Engine with Voronoi track generation.

title: Incomplete
description: 2D puzzle platformer using shader reflections, awarded Gold in Inter-IIT.

title: Hell-Towers
description: Multiplayer tower defense bullet hell game built in Unity.

title: Dungeon Dudes
description: Turn-based puzzle game built in Godot for IB Personal Project.

title: Trail
description: 3D local multiplayer game with custom mesh rendering and physics.
